details: The quantity of Edelweiss and Pandkin Seeds harvested by alchemists is increased by 175%.
The chances of obtaining loot from creatures in the Tofu family are increased by 75%.
A special repeatable quest is available today just south of the Bonta gate. It is available to players of level 20 or higher and is not attached to the offering quest.
An extra challenge is generated for fights against Vulkania monsters.
The quantity of Icefish harvested by fishermen is increased by 150%.
Experience gained in the Astrub Rocky Inlet area is increased by 100%.
Bonuses gained by completing challenges are increased by 200% in the Royal Rainbow Blop Lair dungeon.
Craftsmen have a 15% chance of keeping their ingredients when they craft items in Bonta.
The quantity of cereals harvested by farmers of all levels is increased by 100%.
Fertile Dragoturkeys of all varieties will give birth to one extra baby.
The chances of obtaining loot in the Mount Tombs area are increased by 100%.
Experience gained by fighting Moon Kanniballs is increased by 75%.
Bonuses gained by completing challenges are increased by 150% against Vulkania monsters.
Resources will reappear 150% more quickly than usual in the Amkana Forest area.
The reward bonus on groups of monsters increases every 6 hours in all areas.
Experience gained in the Terrdala area is increased by 100%.
The quantity of Bronze harvested by miners is increased by 150%.
The chances of obtaining loot from creatures in the Mino family are increased by 75%.
Farmers have a 10% chance of keeping their ingredients when they craft items.
Bonuses gained by completing challenges are increased by 200% in the Lousy Pig Plain area.
Experience gains and chances of obtaining loot are increased by 25% in the Vulkania forest zones.
The quantity of Mineral Meat harvested by Hunters is increased by 125%.
The chances of obtaining loot in the Mount Scauldron area are increased by 100%.
Experience gained in the Bworker's Cave is increased by 125%.
An extra challenge is generated for fights against monsters in the Ingalsses' Fields area.
The loot generated by Perceptors is increased by 300% in the Dreggon Dungeon.
Experience gained by fighting Alma's Cradle monsters is increased by 75%.
The quantity of Walnut Wood harvested by lumberjacks is increased by 150%.
The chances of obtaining loot in the Blop Dungeon are increased by 125%.
The reward bonus on groups of monsters increases every 3 hours in the Dragon Pig's Maze area.
Craftsmen have a 15% chance of keeping their ingredients when they craft items in the Amakna Forest area.
